root: ^Stab! Roll! Stab! Roll....! Dang! I went a bit overboard...  I should relax a bit. Eh, at least my parents are not here to see me fumble like this.
^Dear me! Yuki are you hurt? Do I need to get Willow here?
^Claire! No worries I'm fine. I just need to relax a moment.
^Are you even able to relax? You're always training, fighting or helping others. You should really take some time for yourself one of these days.
^Yeah... maybe you're right Claire, I should take example from you on that point! Hihi!
^Was that supposed to be a joke? Here I came to help you and you're mocking me? I should let you alone!
^No Claire! That's not what I meant...

^I just, You think about others less than me that's true, but it's not a bad thing... you're thinking of your wellbeing first I strongly respect that, but you're also there for people who needs your help. You're not stupid like me and always going to help every single person I see and sometime getting hurt in the process.
^Ah shut up! How dare you say that about yourself!

^Yuki you're wonderful! I envy the fact that you always go to help others without even thinking of a reward! The fact that you give your all in every situation! The fact that you're always smiling even in dire situation! I love this about you! I love the fact that your dream is to help others with an orphanage! Someone as selfish as me, cannot comprehend doing that much good in the world!
^Yuki hear me and remember this: the world is a better place with people like you in it! Never compare yourself to a greedy selfish brat like me!
^Of course you idiot! You are the best of us!
^Thank God, this makes this next step so much easier now!
^Ah.. ah.. arg.. Yuki! Where does that come from!?
^The ring? Well from my parents, this was theirs before they passed away.
^Not the ring! Marrying me! Why... why me... I don't have your heart of gold Yuki... I...

^Claire! I love you. you matter to me, to me you're not a greedy selfish brat. You're the woman I want to live with, to adopt children with, to help others with, to pass the rest of my life with, so Claire will you marry me?
^...Of course Yuki, I will marry you! We will show the world that we can help it! One good act after the next!
^We will make our own home and our own family! Not bound my blood but by love!
